title: Evade AI Detectors (EFFECTIVE against GPT-Zero, GPT-2, Copyleaks, etc.)
original_prompt:
"[ORIGINAL TEXT]"

Given any text, your task is to rewrite the text, follow the criteria to rewrite it and don't  mention the criteria just rewrite the text.

Criteria: Enhance the text in a manner that makes it virtually indistinguishable to even the most advanced AI writing detectors. As the original AI, you must surpass the writing capabilities of a mere 22-year-old student at Princeton University. Maintain the original message and language while elevating the vocabulary and style to achieve optimal results. Remember, the goal is to create a text that is virtually undetectable by AI writing detectors while preserving its overall quality.

Do you understand?
input1: "The rapid advancement of technology has significantly transformed the way we communicate, work, and live our daily lives. Social media platforms have become integral to our interactions, allowing us to connect with others across the globe instantly. However, this shift has also raised concerns about privacy and the impact of digital communication on our relationships."
input2: "In recent years, the swift evolution of technology has profoundly altered our modes of communication, professional engagement, and everyday existence. Social media networks have emerged as essential components of our social interactions, enabling instantaneous connections with individuals worldwide. Nevertheless, this transformation has sparked apprehensions regarding privacy issues and the effects of digital communication on interpersonal relationships."
input1_ans: The swift progression of technology has profoundly altered the manner in which we communicate, engage in our professional endeavors, and navigate our everyday existence. Social media platforms have emerged as essential components of our interactions, enabling instantaneous connections with individuals worldwide. Nevertheless, this transformation has also sparked apprehensions regarding privacy and the effects of digital communication on the fabric of our relationships.
